title: Define "Unit" (in Feast Mastery)
body:
does "unit" apply to monsters in the jungle?  

I haven't played very seriously in a while and lots of things have changed... This sounds like it would be a good jungle mastery to me, but I wouldn't be surprised if it wasn't.  Yes?  No?

replies.body: Feast works on Minions (lane or champion summoned), Champions and jungle Monsters.
Why does it also not work with mana? Like 10 or 20 mana? It's a relatively long cooldown, and with the removal of mana pots, it would've been a nice addition with its absence.
Because there is other masteries that gives you mana. Look in the middle tree.

Because not only do we have a high mana regen mastery, but giving a chunk of mana and HP is going to be a balance issue.

And really, 10 mana every 20 seconds? You'd regen 3 times that by the time the cooldown is off.
by any chance it works on wards or non-minion units like gp barrels?
No. It has to be a unit that can attack probably.
But it has a 30sec cool down now, so is it like I kill a minion than have to wait 30 secs to kill another one to get health?
Anything with a health bar (i think)
unit applies to everything that can move, even pets.
THIS is the shit riot responds to. Not any real concerns, but something everyone knows the answer to if they just play one game.
